definition: To provide aid, help, or assistance to someone or something, typically in a supportive or beneficial manner. It is commonly used to describe actions that contribute to the advancement, well-being, or success of individuals, organizations, or causes.

examples.german: Ich unterstütze dich bei deinem Projekt.
examples.english: I support you in your project.

examples.german: Die Regierung unterstützt die Entwicklung erneuerbarer Energien.
examples.english: The government supports the development of renewable energy.

examples.german: Er unterstützt die Idee, das Unternehmen zu erweitern.
examples.english: He supports the idea of expanding the company.
